item.title: NYT Pips hints, answers for December 13, 2025
item.description: The New York Times' latest game, Pips, brings domino fun to your desktop. How to play Pips as well as hints in case you get stuck.

item.title: NYT Connections hints today: Clues, answers for December 13, 2025
item.description: Connections is a New York Times word game that's all about finding the "common threads between words." How to solve the puzzle.

item.title: NYT Strands hints, answers for December 13, 2025

item.title: Wordle today: Answer, hints for December 13, 2025
item.description: Here's the answer for "Wordle" #1637 on December 13 as well as a few hints, tips, and clues to help you solve it yourself.
